title: Beyond Vision: Contextually Enriched Image Captioning with Multi-Modal Retrieva
summary: Real-world image captions often lack contextual depth, omitting crucial details such as event background, temporal cues, outcomes, and named entities that are not visually discernible. This gap limits the effectiveness of image understanding in domains like journalism, education, and digital archives, where richer, more informative descriptions are essential.
